basic.name: Hook (Q)
basic.description: Pull the first enemy hit towards Stitches and deal 91 damage.After reaching level 13, Hook's range is increased by 40%.

basic.name: Slam (W)
basic.description: Deal 104 damage to enemies within the target area. Enemies in the inner impact take 50% more damage and are Slowed by 45% for 2 seconds.

basic.name: Devour (E)
basic.description: Deal 319 damage to non-Heroic units, or 114 damage to Heroes. Restores 20% of Stitches's maximum Health.

basic.name: Helping Hand (?)
basic.description: Activate to use Hook that can hit allied Heroes. Hitting an allied Hero this way reduces the cooldown of Hook by 8 seconds.After reaching level 13, Helping Hand's range is increased by 40%.

heroic.name: Putrid Bile (R)
heroic.description: Emit bile that deals 37 damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

heroic.name: Gorge (R)
heroic.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

trait.name: Shambling Horror (T)
trait.description: Activate to spread Vile Gas in a large area every second and prevent your Movement Speed from being reduced below 110% for 4 seconds.Vile GasHitting enemies with Basic Attacks or the inner area of Slam afflicts them with Vile Gas, dealing an additional 36 damage over 4 seconds. Deals 150% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

1.name: Patchwork Creation
1.description: Gain 3 Armor for every unit afflicted with Vile Gas, stacking up to 8 times. While Shambling Horror is active, this Armor amount is doubled.Passive: Increase regeneration effects and all healing received by 15%.

1.name: Savor The Flavor
1.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Devour increases Stitches' Health Regeneration by 1.5 and the damage of Vile Gas by 2%, stacking up to 100 times.

1.name: Hungry for More
1.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed.Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Stitches's maximum Health by 25. Reward: Every 20 Globes gathered permanently increases Stitches' Movement Speed by an additional 5%.

4.name: Playtime!
4.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Slam by 0.75 seconds and restores 5 Mana. Hitting Heroes with the inner area of Slam reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

4.name: Vile Cleaver
4.description: Basic Attacks against enemies with Vile Gas deal 35% more damage and spreads Vile Gas to nearby enemies. Passive: Slam applies Vile Gas to all targets hit.

4.name: Tenderizer
4.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes Slow by 20% for 1.5 seconds and restore 1.75% of Stitches' maximum Health.

7.name: Serrated Edge
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook deals bonus damage equal to 5% of their maximum Health, reduces Hook's cooldown by 4 seconds, and restores 35 Mana.

7.name: Second Helping
7.description: Devour gains 1 additional charge with a 6 second cooldown between uses. Gambit: If Stitches is at max Health after using Devour, he gains a Shield equal to 15% of his maximum Health for 10 seconds. Every death, reduce this Shield by 3%.

7.name: Putrefaction
7.description: While Shambling Horror is active, Vile Gas reduces healing received by 40%.Passive: Vile Gas heals Stitches for 75% of the damage dealt.

10.name: Putrid Bile
10.description: Emit bile that deals 37 damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

10.name: Gorge
10.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

13.name: Meat Hook
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook heals Stitches for 20% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. While active, Basic Attacks against the Hero hit refresh the duration of this effect.

13.name: Under Pressure
13.description: Increase Slam's damage by 25.Quest: After damaging Heroes with Vile Gas 6 times, permanently increase the damage of Slam by 1, to a maximum of 75 additional damage.

13.name: Chop Chop
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook or activating Shambling Horror grants 40% increased Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration of this effect.

16.name: Pulverize
16.description: All enemies hit by Slam are Slowed by 70% for 0.75 seconds and Heroes have their Armor reduced by 10 for 3 seconds.

16.name: Digestive Juices
16.description: Devour deals an additional 140 damage over 5 seconds. When used on a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds and causes the Hero hit to deal 50% reduced damage for 4 seconds.

16.name: Flare Up
16.description: Deals 15 damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook or activating Shambling Horror increases this damage by 150% for 4 seconds.

20.name: Gift From The Embalmer
20.description: Putrid Bile deals 100% more damage to Heroes.Quest: Each time Putrid Bile damages an enemy Hero, the duration of Stitches' next death timer is reduced by 2%, to a maximum of 80% total reduction. All stacks of this effect are lost upon death.

20.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
20.description: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them. Enemies are Slowed by 75% for 1 second after Gorge ends.

20.name: Master Hooker
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Hook by 4 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit by Hook have 75% reduced healing for 2 seconds. Allies hit by Helping Hand are Unkillable for 2 seconds.

20.name: Gas Bag
20.description: Activating Shambling Horror grants Unstoppable for 3 seconds.Passive: Shambling Horror's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.
